summary: Ego vehicle is driving straight on a road with buildings on both sides. There are other vehicles in the distance. A motorcyclist appears from behind concrete blocks on the left side of the road and crosses the crosswalk.
actions: Ego vehicle is driving straight. Other vehicles are moving in the distance. A motorcyclist is crossing the road on a crosswalk.
key_objects: Ego vehicle, other vehicles, motorcyclist, concrete blocks, crosswalk
next_action: Ego vehicle will continue driving straight.
